title: Yamuna Expressway property prices surge: Plots appreciate over 500%, apartments up 158% show data
author: Printer Beatrix
excerpt: According to the latest RealX Stats by InvestoXpert Advisors, apartments along the corridor appreciated by 158% between 2020 and 2025, while plots witnessed an extraordinary five-fold jump of 536% during the same period.
